then: Apply pressure to stop bleeding. Clean wound and bandage.
Hold under cool running water for 15 minutes. Do NOT apply ice.
Perform 5 back blows followed by abdominal thrusts (Heimlich maneuver).
Use RICE: Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation.
Lean forward and pinch the nose for 10 minutes.
Immobilize the injured area and seek medical attention.
Lay the person down and elevate legs. Ensure fresh air.
Rest in a dark, quiet room. Drink water and take pain relief if safe.
